Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Comedy | Family
Status: New Series
Network: BBC One ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 08:30 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: June 08, 2011

In With The Flynns is a sitcom starring Will Mellor, Warren Clarke, Niky Wardley and Craig Parkinson. The show shows what family life is like, as you attempt to hold down jobs, raise three children and also have to deal with an irresponsible brother and a difficult dad.
(The series is actually based on the US comedy show Grounded For Life.) 
(http://www.tvrage.com/In_With_The_Flynns)
